## getVertexAttribFormat() function

Get vertex format by semantic and component type and component count

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function getVertexAttribFormat(semantic: VertexSemantic, type: DataType, count: number): VertexAttribFormat;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  semantic | [VertexSemantic](doc/markdown/./device.vertexsemantic.md) | The vertex semantic |
|  type | [DataType](doc/markdown/./device.datatype.md) | Data type of vertex component |
|  count | number | The count of vertex components |

**Returns:**

[VertexAttribFormat](doc/markdown/./device.vertexattribformat.md)

Vertex format
